text: Lise Bellanger. Author. Pierre Drouin. Author. Aymeric Stamm. Author, maintainer. Benjamin Martineau. Contributor.

text: Bellanger L, Drouin P, Stamm (2022). squat: Statistics QUAternion Temporal Data. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://lmjl-alea.github.io/squat/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {squat: Statistics for QUAternion Temporal Data},   author = {Lise Bellanger and Pierre Drouin and Aymeric Stamm},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://lmjl-alea.github.io/squat/}, }

title: Statistics for QUAternion Temporal Data
text: goal squat provide extensions common statistical methods analysis unit quaternion time series.

title: Statistics for QUAternion Temporal Data
text: can install development version squat GitHub :

title: Statistics for QUAternion Temporal Data
text: basic example shows solve common problem:

what: Dynamic Time Warping for Quaternion Time Series — dtw
title: Dynamic Time Warping for Quaternion Time Series — dtw
text: function evaluates Dynamic Time Warping (DTW) distance two quaternion time series (QTS).

title: Dynamic Time Warping for Quaternion Time Series — dtw
code: DTW(   qts1,   qts2,   resample = TRUE,   disable_normalization = FALSE,   distance_only = FALSE,   step_pattern = dtw::symmetric2 )  DTWi(   qts1,   qts2,   resample = TRUE,   disable_normalization = FALSE,   distance_only = FALSE,   step_pattern = dtw::symmetric2 )

title: Dynamic Time Warping for Quaternion Time Series — dtw
text: qts1 tibble storing 1st quaternion time series. qts2 tibble storing 2nd quaternion time series. resample boolean specifying whether QTS uniformly resampled domain computing distances. Defaults TRUE. disable_normalization boolean specifying whether quaternion normalization disabled. Defaults FALSE ensures always deal unit quaternions. distance_only boolean specifying whether compute distance (backtrack, faster). Defaults FALSE. step_pattern stepPattern specifying local constraints warping path. Defaults symmetric2 uses symmetric normalizable warping paths local slope constraints. See stepPattern information.

title: Dynamic Time Warping for Quaternion Time Series — dtw
text: object class dtw storing dynamic time warping results.

title: Dynamic Time Warping for Quaternion Time Series — dtw
text: evaluation grid provided, function assumes two input QTS evaluated grid.

title: Dynamic Time Warping for Quaternion Time Series — dtw

what: QTS Transformation from Angular Velocity Time Series — avts2qts
title: QTS Transformation from Angular Velocity Time Series — avts2qts
text: function projects back angular velocity time series space quaternions.

title: QTS Transformation from Angular Velocity Time Series — avts2qts
QTS Transformation from Angular Velocity Time Series — avts2qts
text: avts angular velocity time series stored tibbles columns time, x, y z. init_t positive scalar specifying initial time point. init_q length-4 numeric vector speicyfing quaternion initial time point.

title: QTS Transformation from Angular Velocity Time Series — avts2qts
text: quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z.

title: QTS Transformation from Angular Velocity Time Series — avts2qts
QTS Centering and Standardization — centring_qts
text: function operates centring QTS around geometric mean quaternions. effectively achieved premultiplying quaternion inverse geometric mean.

title: QTS Centering and Standardization — centring_qts
text: qts quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z. standardize boolean specifying whether standardize QTS addition centering . Defaults FALSE.

title: QTS Centering and Standardization — centring_qts
text: quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z quaternions centered around geometric mean.

title: QTS Derivative — derivative_qts
text: function computes first derivative quaternion time series respect time.

title: QTS Derivative — derivative_qts
text: qts object class qts.

title: QTS Derivative — derivative_qts
text: object class qts quaternions measure rotation applied transform attitude previous time point attitude current time point.

what: Distance Matrix for Quaternion Time Series Samples — distDTW
title: Distance Matrix for Quaternion Time Series Samples — distDTW
text: Distance Matrix Quaternion Time Series Samples

title: Distance Matrix for Quaternion Time Series Samples — distDTW
code: distDTW(   qts_list,   normalize_distance = TRUE,   labels = NULL,   resample = TRUE,   disable_normalization = FALSE,   step_pattern = dtw::symmetric2,   quotient_space = FALSE )

title: Distance Matrix for Quaternion Time Series Samples — distDTW
text: qts_list list tibbles storing sample quaternion time series. normalize_distance boolean specifying whether compute normalized distance QTS. Please note step patterns normalizable. Defaults FALSE. labels character vector specifying labels QTS. Defaults NULL uses row numbers labels. resample boolean specifying whether QTS uniformly resampled domain computing distances. Defaults TRUE. disable_normalization boolean specifying whether quaternion normalization disabled. Defaults FALSE ensures always deal unit quaternions. step_pattern stepPattern specifying local constraints warping path. Defaults symmetric2 uses symmetric normalizable warping paths local slope constraints. See stepPattern information. quotient_space boolean specifying whether make distance invariant coordinate system rotations expressed. Defaults FALSE backward compatibility faster computation.

title: Distance Matrix for Quaternion Time Series Samples — distDTW
text: dist object storing distance matrix QTS sample via DTW.

title: Distance Matrix for Quaternion Time Series Samples — distDTW
QTS Exponential — exp_qts
text: function computes exponential quaternion time series time series quaternion exponentials.

title: QTS Exponential — exp_qts
text: qts quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z.

title: QTS Exponential — exp_qts
text: quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z quaternions replaced exponential.

title: QTS K-Means Alignment Algorithm — kmeans_qts
text: function massages input quaternion time series feed k-means alignment algorithm jointly clustering aligning input QTS.

title: QTS K-Means Alignment Algorithm — kmeans_qts
code: kmeans_qts(   qts_list,   k = 1,   centroid = "mean",   diss = "l2",   warping = "affine",   iter_max = 20,   nstart = 1000,   ncores = 1L )

title: QTS K-Means Alignment Algorithm — kmeans_qts
text: qts_list list QTS stored tibbles columns time, w, x, y z. k integer specifying number clusters formed. Defaults 1L. centroid string specifying type centroid used. Choices mean medoid. Defaults mean. diss string specifying type dissimilarity used. Choices l2 pearson. Defaults l2. warping string specifying class warping functions used. Choices none, shift, dilation affine. Defaults affine. iter_max integer specifying maximum number iterations terminating k-mean algorithm. Defautls 20L. nstart integer specifying number random restart making k-mean results robust. Defaults 1000L. ncores integer specifying number cores run multiple restarts k-mean algorithm parallel. Defaults 1L.

title: QTS K-Means Alignment Algorithm — kmeans_qts
text: kma object storing results best k-mean alignment algorithm run.

title: QTS Logarithm — log_qts
text: function computes logarithm quaternion time series time series quaternion logarithms.

title: QTS Logarithm — log_qts
text: qts quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z.

title: QTS Logarithm — log_qts
text: quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z quaternions replaced logarithm.

title: QTS Geometric Mean — mean_qts
text: function computes pointwise geometric mean list QTS.

title: QTS Geometric Mean — mean_qts
text: qts_list list quaternion time series stored tibbles columns time, w, x, y z.

title: QTS Geometric Mean — mean_qts
text: quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z quaternions pointwise geometric mean.

title: QTS Geometric Median — median_qts
text: function computes pointwise geometric median list QTS.

title: QTS Geometric Median — median_qts
text: qts_list list quaternion time series stored tibbles columns time, w, x, y z.

title: QTS Geometric Median — median_qts
text: quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z quaternions pointwise geometric median.

title: QTS Normalization — normalize_qts
text: function ensures quaternions time series unit quaternions.

title: QTS Normalization — normalize_qts
text: qts quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z.

title: QTS Normalization — normalize_qts
text: quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z quaternions unit quaternions.

title: QTS Class — qts
text: collection functions implements QTS class. currently provides as_qts() function QTS coercion tibbles is_qts() function checking object QTS.

title: QTS Class — qts
text: x tibble columns time, w, x, y z.

title: QTS Class — qts
text: object class qts.

title: QTS Class — qts
text: quaternion time series (QTS) stored tibble 5 columns: time: first column specifying time points quaternions collected; w: second column specifying first coordinate collected quaternions; x: third column specifying second coordinate collected quaternions; y: fourth column specifying third coordinate collected quaternions; z: fifth column specifying fourth coordinate collected quaternions.

title: QTS Class — qts
code: qts1 <- vespa$igp[[1]] qts2 <- as_qts(qts1) is_qts(qts1) #> [1] TRUE is_qts(qts2) #> [1] TRUE

what: QTS Transformation To Angle Time Series — qts2angle
title: QTS Transformation To Angle Time Series — qts2angle
text: function computes univariate time series representing angle first attitudes.

title: QTS Transformation To Angle Time Series — qts2angle
QTS Transformation To Angle Time Series — qts2angle
text: qts quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z. disable_normalization boolean specifying whether quaternion normalization disabled. Defaults FALSE.

title: QTS Transformation To Angle Time Series — qts2angle
text: time series stored tibble columns time angle angle measures angle current rotation first one.

title: QTS Transformation To Angle Time Series — qts2angle

what: QTS Transformation to Angular Velocity Time Series — qts2avts
title: QTS Transformation to Angular Velocity Time Series — qts2avts
text: function projects quaternion time series space angular velocities.

title: QTS Transformation to Angular Velocity Time Series — qts2avts
QTS Transformation to Angular Velocity Time Series — qts2avts
text: qts QTS stored tibbles columns time, w, x, y z. fixed_frame string specifying fixed frame respect coordinates angular velocity computed. Choices "global" "body". Defaults "global".

title: QTS Transformation to Angular Velocity Time Series — qts2avts
text: time series stored tibble columns time, x, y z containing angular velocity time point.

title: QTS Transformation to Angular Velocity Time Series — qts2avts

what: QTS Transformation To Distance Time Series — qts2distance
title: QTS Transformation To Distance Time Series — qts2distance
text: function computes real-valued time series reporting pointwise geodesic distance two input QTS time point.

title: QTS Transformation To Distance Time Series — qts2distance
QTS Transformation To Distance Time Series — qts2distance
text: first_qts quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z. second_qts quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z.

title: QTS Transformation To Distance Time Series — qts2distance
text: time series stored tibble columns time distance distance measures angular distance quaternions input QTS given time point.

title: QTS Transformation To Distance Time Series — qts2distance
text: function currently expects two input QTS evaluated time grid check assumption.

title: QTS Transformation To Distance Time Series — qts2distance

what: QTS Transformation To Norm Time Series — qts2norm
title: QTS Transformation To Norm Time Series — qts2norm
text: function computes univariate time series representing norm quaternions.

title: QTS Transformation To Norm Time Series — qts2norm
QTS Transformation To Norm Time Series — qts2norm
text: qts quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z. disable_normalization boolean specifying whether quaternion normalization disabled. Defaults FALSE.

title: QTS Transformation To Norm Time Series — qts2norm
text: time series stored tibble columns time norm norm measures angular distance current quaternion identity.

title: QTS Transformation To Norm Time Series — qts2norm
QTS Reorientation — reorient_qts
text: function reorients quaternions QTS representing attitude respect first time point.

title: QTS Reorientation — reorient_qts
text: qts quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z. disable_normalization boolean specifying whether quaternion normalization disabled. Defaults FALSE.

title: QTS Reorientation — reorient_qts
text: quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z quaternions measure attitude respect first time point.

title: QTS Resampling — resample_qts
text: function performs uniform resampling using SLERP.

title: QTS Resampling — resample_qts
code: resample_qts(   qts,   tmin = NA_real_,   tmax = NA_real_,   nout = 0L,   disable_normalization = FALSE )

title: QTS Resampling — resample_qts
text: qts quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z. tmin numeric value specifying lower bound time interval uniform resampling take place. must satisfy tmin >= min(qts$time). Defaults NA case set min(qts$time). tmax numeric value specifying upper bound time interval uniform resampling take place. must satisfy tmax <= max(qts$time). Defaults NA case set max(qts$time). nout integer specifying size uniform grid time resampling. Defaults 0L case uses grid size input QTS. disable_normalization boolean specifying whether quaternion normalization disabled. Defaults FALSE case function makes sure quaternions normalized prior performing SLERP interpolation.

title: QTS Resampling — resample_qts
text: quaternion time series stored tibble columns time, w, x, y z quaternions uniformly sampled range [tmin, tmax].

title: QTS Random Sampling — rnorm_qts
text: function adds uncorrelated Gaussian noise logarithm QTS using exponential covariance function.

title: QTS Random Sampling — rnorm_qts
text: n integer specifying many QTS generated. mean_qts object class qts specifying mean QTS. alpha positive scalar specifying variance component log-QTS. Defaults 0.01. beta positive scalar specifying exponential weight. Defaults 0.001.

title: QTS Random Sampling — rnorm_qts
text: list n objects class qts added noise specified parameters alpha beta.

title: QTS Random Sampling — rnorm_qts
text: See exp_cov_function details roles alpha beta definition covariance operator.

what: QTS Sample Centering and Standardization — scale_qts
title: QTS Sample Centering and Standardization — scale_qts
text: QTS Sample Centering Standardization

title: QTS Sample Centering and Standardization — scale_qts
code: scale_qts(   qts_list,   center = TRUE,   standardize = TRUE,   by_row = FALSE,   keep_summary_stats = FALSE )

title: QTS Sample Centering and Standardization — scale_qts
text: qts_list list objects class qts representing sample QTS observations. center boolean specifying whether center sample QTS. set FALSE, original sample returned, meaning standardization performed regardless whether argument standardize set TRUE . Defaults TRUE. standardize boolean specifying whether standardize sample QTS centered. Defaults TRUE. by_row boolean specifying whether QTS scaling happen data point (by_row = TRUE) time point (by_row = FALSE). Defaults FALSE. keep_summary_stats boolean specifying whether mean standard deviation used standardizing data. Defaults FALSE case list properly rescaled QTS returned.

title: QTS Sample Centering and Standardization — scale_qts
text: list properly rescaled QTS stored objects class qts keep_summary_stats = FALSE. Otherwise list three components: qts_list: list properly rescaled QTS stored objects class qts; mean: numeric vector quaternion Fréchet mean; sd: numeric vector quaternion Fréchet standard deviation.

title: QTS Sample Centering and Standardization — scale_qts

what: Visualization of Tangent PCA for QTS — tpca-visualization
title: Visualization of Tangent PCA for QTS — tpca-visualization
text: Visualization Tangent PCA QTS

title: Visualization of Tangent PCA for QTS — tpca-visualization
code: # S3 method for qtsTPCA plot(x, what = "PC1", ...)  # S3 method for qtsTPCA autoplot(x, what = "PC1", ...)

title: Visualization of Tangent PCA for QTS — tpca-visualization
text: x object class qtsTPCA produced tpca_qts. string specifying kind visualization user wants perform. Choices words starting PC ending PC number (case mean QTS displayed along perturbations due required PC) scores (case individuals projected required plance). Defaults PC1. ... = "PC?", user can specify whether plot QTS tangent space original space providing boolean argument original_space defaults TRUE. = "scores", user can specify plane onto individuals projected providing length-2 integer vector argument plane defaults 1:2.

title: Visualization of Tangent PCA for QTS — tpca-visualization
text: plot.qtsTPCA method return anything autoplot.qtsTPCA method returns ggplot object.

title: Visualization of Tangent PCA for QTS — tpca-visualization
code: res_pca <- tpca_qts(vespa64$igp)  # You can plot the effect of a PC on the mean plot(res_pca, what = "PC1") #> The `original_space` boolean argument is not specified. Defaulting to TRUE.   # You can plot the data points in a PC plane plot(res_pca, what = "scores") #> The `plane` length-2 integer vector argument is not specified. Defaulting to #> 1:2.   # You can color points according to a categorical variable if (requireNamespace("ggplot2", quietly = TRUE)) {   p <- ggplot2::autoplot(res_pca, what = "scores")   p + ggplot2::geom_point(ggplot2::aes(color = vespa64$V)) } #> The `plane` length-2 integer vector argument is not specified. Defaulting to #> 1:2. #> Warning: ggrepel: 3 unlabeled data points (too many overlaps). Consider increasing max.overlaps

The VESPA dataset — vespa
text: set QTS representing individual gait patterns (IGPs) individuals collected number varying factors.

title: The VESPA dataset — vespa
text: tibble 320 rows 7 columns: V: categorical variable two levels specifying ID Volunteer; E: categorical variable two levels specifying ID Experimenter; S: categorical variable four levels specifying type Sensor; P: categorical variable four levels specifying Position sensor; : categorical variable two levels specifying ID Acquisition pathway; R: categorical variable 5 levels specifying ID Repetition; igp: 101x5 tibble storing QTS represents IGP individual specific set VESPA conditions.

title: The VESPA dataset — vespa
text: IGP measures hip rotation typical gait cycle. rotation expressed respect mean position sensor gait cycle. IGP straightened periodic last point matching first one.

title: The VESPA64 dataset — vespa64
text: IGP measures hip rotation typical gait cycle. rotation expressed respect mean position sensor gait cycle. IGP straightened periodic last point matching first one. essentially reduced version VESPA data set IGPs averaged repetition set conditions.
